info.description: An association of a Patient with an Organization and  Healthcare Provider(s) for a period of time that the Organization assumes some level of responsibility
info.title: FHIR R4 EpisodeOfCare Resource

role.description: Role that this diagnosis has within the episode of care (e.g. admission, billing, discharge â€¦)

period.description: Duration the EpisodeOfCare was in the specified status
